an4.158:4.1: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an4.158:4.3: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ.
an4.158:5.1: “Yo hi koci, āvuso, bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā cattāro dhamme attani samanupassati, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ:
an4.158:5.5: Rāgavepullattaṃ, dosavepullattaṃ, mohavepullattaṃ, gambhīresu kho panassa ṭhānāṭhānesu paññācakkhu na kamati.
an4.158:5.6: Yo hi koci, āvuso, bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā ime cattāro dhamme attani samanupassati, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ:
an4.158:6.1: Yo hi koci, āvuso, bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā cattāro dhamme attani samanupassati, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ:
an4.158:6.5: Rāgatanuttaṃ, dosatanuttaṃ, mohatanuttaṃ, gambhīresu kho panassa ṭhānāṭhānesu paññācakkhu kamati.
an4.158:6.6: Yo hi koci, āvuso, bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā ime cattāro dhamme attani samanupassati, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ:
